name: Case on the Belmont Express
description:
Story

You play as an earnest constable in training, Henry,  whose name is being echoed throughout social circles due to his keen intellect.

Henry thought he was going on a relaxing ride aboard the Belmont Express. Unfortunately, his plans were rudely interrupted when someone was discovered to be dead! 

Marlon, once a flamboyant and wealthy gentleman, was murdered. Can you find out who is guilty? The clock is ticking.

Characters Henry An earnest constable in training whose name is being echoed throughout social circles due to his great ability. Sergeant Walter A veteran who is currently active in the police force. He discovered the body and is a generally helpful presence. Marius, The Cook An employee on the train. Jean The widow of the deceased, and currently in mourning. Alina, The Nurse A kind nurse from the country who is employed on the train. Damien, The Conductor A money-hungry man who helps manage the train. He's not a stranger to rich people's feuds. Lana, The Actress A reasonably well-known actress with a fondness for tart cherries. Snowball Is this really happening? Is the cat a suspect?
